abstract: Two longtime executives, Alex Gorsky and Sheri S. McCoy, have been given expanded roles in the troubled health care company.
snippet: Two longtime executives, Alex Gorsky and Sheri S. McCoy, have been given expanded roles in the troubled health care company.
lead_paragraph: After a year marked by embarrassing consumer product calls, Johnson and Johnson on Wednesday set in motion a horse race between two longtime executives to succeed William C. Weldon, 62, the chief executive and chairman.

headline.main: 2 in Race to Lead Johnson & Johnson
headline.print_headline: Johnson & Johnson Positions 2 in Line to Succeed Chief Executive
